https://sourceforge.=

ainscope mode, but not in

tier settings.

One of the fai=
lures looks to be fixed in post-1.2.0 Heritrix and the
other seems new (Any=
 other info around this failure would be appreciated).

In general, the Hos=
tQueuesFrontier and its associated DiskQueues have
been deprecated in HEAD =
in favor of BdbFrontier (1.4.0 Heritrix will
use BdbFrontier by default).  =
It would be interesting to see how
Heritrix broad crawling using HEAD compa=
red against what you have
above.  Currently, it will OOME eventually but sh=
ould run for longer
before it does so (We'd be very interested in hearing a=
bout any
exceptions managing queues).

Thanks for the comparison info.
